title: Frostbase
author: Frostbase
content: Hello,I'm in a rush to make a transaction on the tron network, and since there are no swaps on Trust wallet that can swap BUSD to Tron, I want to put offer hereI want to buy 60 tron for 3 BUSD, if you are trusted member, I will send first. I'm in a rush so I would appreciate it if it can go fast

comments.author: Extrarakeback
comments.body: So that's why you add 50% exchange fee to your favor ?1 trx is more than 0.07busdGood luck

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Your offer is not that good. Perhaps that why people ignored your advert.Right now, 3 BUSD can get you roughly 43 TRX. Not sure if you will get a trading partner who will want to sell you TRX at a loss. Incentivize the trade please, if you want some offers or at least make it fair at the current rate.

comments.author: geartips
comments.body: contact service on instagram @flypexchangeI exchanged tron for USDT but i think they do this too. Thanks
